name: DANIEL HE
profile_summary: Driven Senior Python Engineer skilled in **Python**, **Django**, **SQL**, **AWS**, **Kubernetes**, **GraphQL**, and **REST**. Expert in implementing CI/CD pipelines and adopting best practices in **Git**, **Design Patterns**, and **Automated Testing**. Proven ability to manage technical debt and facilitate smooth **Database Migrations** while enhancing system architecture. With 9+ years of experience, I have excelled in mentoring teams and promoting effective **SDLC** processes, all while delivering scalable, user-oriented solutions in sectors such as healthcare and finance. Highly focused on clean code practices and efficient refactoring to optimize application performance.

experience.responsibilities:
Leveraged **Python** and **Django** to design and implement scalable web applications, achieving a **40%** boost in performance through optimized query handling with **SQL** databases.
Developed robust **REST** APIs and **GraphQL** endpoints, ensuring data integrity and seamless integration, resulting in a **30%** reduction in response times.
Implemented **CI/CD** pipelines utilizing **Git** and **AWS** services, leading to faster release cycles and a **60%** reduction in deployment errors.
Applied best practices in **Design Patterns** and **Refactoring**, enhancing code maintainability and reducing technical debt by **25%**.
Conducted comprehensive **Automated Testing** and **Code Review**, contributing to a **50%** decrease in post-deployment issues.
Managed cloud-based applications using **Kubernetes**, ensuring high availability with a target uptime of **99.9%** and efficient resource management.
Facilitated team collaboration and mentorship, enhancing communication and knowledge sharing among peers.

Developed robust applications using **Python** and the **Django** framework, enhancing system performance and scalability by 30%.
Executed database design and management with **SQL**, implementing efficient **ORMs** for improved data retrieval speeds, achieving a 15% reduction in query time.
Implemented **REST** APIs and **GraphQL** for seamless data interactions, boosting frontend responsiveness by 40%.
Leveraged **AWS** services for cloud deployment, with a focus on **Kubernetes** for container orchestration, leading to a 50% reduction in deployment time.
Streamlined CI/CD pipelines using **Git**, **Jenkins**, and **AWS CodePipeline**, resulting in a consistent release cycle with a 90% automated testing coverage.
Reviewed and refactored code to manage **technical debt**, improving code maintainability and readability by 25%.
Conducted knowledge-sharing sessions and mentoring programs, enhancing team communication and boosting productivity across projects by 20%.

Utilized **Python** and **Django** to develop robust backend services, maintaining a **99% uptime** across applications.
Designed and implemented **REST** and **GraphQL** APIs, enhancing data retrieval efficiency by **50%**.
Executed **database migrations** and optimized SQL queries, resulting in a reduction of query time by **25%**.
Managed container orchestration through **Kubernetes** for seamless deployment in various environments, minimizing downtime.
Implemented CI/CD pipelines using tools such as **Git** and AWS services, improving deployment speed by **30%**.
Conducted automated testing practices and code reviews to uphold code quality and reduce technical debt by **15%**.
Mentored junior developers, fostering skills in **design patterns** and **refactoring** techniques for better software maintainability.
